headline: Ask HN: Spam Filter for Office 365
description: We use the Cloud-base Office 365 Outlook mail server and looking for a better spam protection than the built-in one. We don't want a self hosted solution and it should integrate with Office 365 out of the box. We have heard of N-able Mail Assure but there are a lot of bad reviews out there. Has anyone heard of a better alternative?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 垃圾邮件过滤器，适用于Office 365
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 垃圾郵件過濾器，適用於Office 365
description_zh-Hans: 我们使用云端的Office 365 Outlook邮件服务器，正在寻找一个比内置的更好的垃圾邮件保护。我们不想要一个自我托管的解决方案，它应该与Office 365开箱即用。我们听说过N-able Mail Assure，但外面有很多差评。有人听说过更好的替代品吗？
description_zh-Hant: 我們使用雲端的Office 365 Outlook郵件服務器，正在尋找一個比內置的更好的垃圾郵件保護。我們不想要一個自我託管的解決方案，它應該與Office 365開箱即用。我們聽說過N-able Mail Assure，但外面有很多差評。有人聽說過更好的替代品嗎？
